law.catch_line: Annually, the State shall appropriate and pay to the Mayor and Aldermen of the City of Annapolis the...
law.text:
Annually, the State shall appropriate and pay to the Mayor and Aldermen of the City of Annapolis the sum provided in the State budget as payment for:
the collection of refuse from State buildings located in the City of Annapolis; and
other services provided to the State by the City of Annapolis.
